com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.crypto.ed25519

Class Ed25519Signature

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.crypto.ed25519.Ed25519Signature

  • public final class Ed25519Signature
extends Object
    ED25519 signature generation and verification

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Ed25519Signature forMessage(Ed25519PrivateKey privateKey, byte[] message)
      Calculate an ED25519 signature from the given private key and message bytes.
      static Ed25519Signature forMessage(Ed25519PrivateKey privateKey, byte[] message, int messageOffset, int messageLen)
      Calculate an ED25519 signature from the given private key and message bytes (with offset into the byte array and number of bytes to process).
      static Ed25519Signature fromBytes(byte[] signature)
      Recover a signature from its binary representation given by toBytes()
      static Ed25519Signature fromString(String sigString)
      Recover a signature from its text representation given by toString()
      byte[] toBytes()
      Get the binary representation of this signature.
      String toString()
      Get the text representation of this signature.
      boolean verify(Ed25519PublicKey publicKey, byte[] message)
      Verify that this signature was generated by the owner of the given public key, for the given message bytes.
      boolean verify(Ed25519PublicKey publicKey, byte[] message, int messageOffset, int messageLen)
      Verify that this signature was generated by the owner of the given public key, for the given message bytes (with offset into the byte array and number of bytes to process).

        Get the binary representation of this signature. Can be recovered later with fromBytes(byte[]).
